JOHN 10.35 jabai jainans qaþ guda, du þaimei waurd gudis warþ, jah ni maht ist gatairan þata gamelido; JOHN 10.36 þanei atta gaweihaida jah insandida in þana fairƕu, jus qiþiþ þatei wajamerjau, unte qaþ: sunus gudis im?
JOHN 10.37 niba taujau waurstwa attins meinis, ni galaubeiþ mis;
JOHN 10.38 iþ jabai taujau, niba mis galaubjaiþ, þaim waurstwam galaubjaiþ, ei ufkunnaiþ jah galaubjaiþ þatei in mis atta jah ik in imma.
JOHN 10.39 sokidedun ina aftra gafahan, jah usiddja us handum ize.
JOHN 10.40 jah galaiþ aftra ufar Iaurdanu in þana stad þarei was Iohannes frumist daupjands, jah salida jainar.
JOHN 10.41 jah managai qemun at imma jah qeþun þatei
Iohannes gatawida taikne ni ainohun; iþ allata þatei qaþ Iohannes bi þana, sunja was.
JOHN 10.42 jah galaubidedun managai du imma jainar.
JOHN 11.1 Wasuh þan sums siuks, Lazarus af Beþanias, us haimai Marjins jah Marþins, swistrs izos.
JOHN 11.2 wasuh þan Marja, soei salboda fraujan balsana jah biswarb fotuns is skufta seinamma, þizozei broþar Lazarus siuks was.
JOHN 11.3 insandidedun þan þos swistrjus is du imma qiþandeins:
frauja, sai, þanei frijos siuks ist.
so siukei nist du dauþau, ak in hauheinais gudis, ei hauhjaidau sunus gudis þairh þata.
JOHN 11.5 frijoduh þan Iesus Marþan jah swistar izos jah Lazaru.
JOHN 11.6 swe hausida þatei siuks was, þanuh þan salida in þammei was stada twans dagans.
JOHN 11.7 þaþroh þan afar þata qaþ du siponjam:
JOHN 11.8 qeþun du imma þai siponjos:
rabbei, nu sokidedun þuk afwairpan stainam Iudaieis, jah aftra gaggis jaind?
jabai ƕas gaggiþ in dag, ni gastiggqiþ, unte liuhaþ þis fairƕaus gasaiƕiþ;
JOHN 11.10 aþþan jabai ƕas gaggiþ in naht, gastiggqiþ, unte liuhad nist in imma.
JOHN 11.11 þo qaþ jah afar þata qiþiþ du im:
JOHN 11.12 þanuh qeþun þai siponjos is:
JOHN 11.13 qaþuh þan Iesus bi dauþu is;
iþ jainai hugidedun þatei is bi slep qeþi.
JOHN 11.14 þanuh þan qaþ du im Iesus swikunþaba:
Lazarus gaswalt, JOHN 11.15 jah fagino in izwara, ei galaubjaiþ, unte ni was jainar;
JOHN 11.16 þanuh qaþ Þomas saei haitada Didimus þaim gahlaibam seinaim:
gaggam jah weis, ei gaswiltaima miþ imma.
JOHN 11.17 qimands þan Iesus bigat ina juþan fidwor dagans habandan in hlaiwa.
JOHN 11.18 wasuh þan Beþania neƕa Iairusaulwmim, swaswe ana spaurdim fimftaihunim.
JOHN 11.19 jah managai Iudaie gaqemun bi Marþan jah Marjan, ei gaþrafstidedeina ijos bi þana broþar izo.
JOHN 11.20 iþ Marþa, sunsei hausida þatei Iesus qimiþ, wiþraïddja ina;
JOHN 11.21 þanuh qaþ Marþa du Iesua:
frauja, iþ weseis her, ni þau gadauþnodedi broþar meins.
JOHN 11.22 akei jah nu wait, ei þisƕah þei bidjis guþ, gibiþ þus guþ.
wait þatei usstandiþ in usstassai in þamma spedistin daga.
ik im so usstass jah libains;
saei galaubeiþ du mis, þauh ga-dauþniþ-ba, libaid;
JOHN 11.26 jah ƕazuh saei libaiþ jah galaubeiþ du mis, ni gadauþniþ aiw.
jai, frauja, ik galaubida þatei þu is Xristus, sunus gudis, sa in þana fairƕu qimanda.
JOHN 11.28 jah þata qiþandei galaiþ jah wopida Marjan, swistar seina, þiubjo qiþandei:
